name: Better DOOM
description:
My very first sh*tpost game. I was required to use the assets in whatever way I pleased, and so I decided to make the best FPS ever.

BEST PLAYED IN FULL SCREEN! I tried something new with the UI to give the text some pixelation but it makes it scale weirdly.

Most assets: given

in-game music 1: dootdoot Band E1M1 DOOT by R. Zapata

in-game music 2: dootdoot Band E2M1 DOOT by R. Zapata
